description:
Featured in CNN, TechCrunch, The Verge, FastCompany.

Sunrise is a free calendar app made for Google Calendar, iCloud and Exchange. Designed with love, Sunrise is a new experience that will make your life easier.

Features:
• 100% free calendar app with a gorgeous design.
•  Compatible with Google Calendar, iCloud, Exchange.
• A completely redesigned calendar experience for your iPhone and iPad.
• Synchronization that just works, in real-time and with background updates.
• Quick Add Event just by typing "Lunch tomorrow at 9pm" (long-press on the +) (for Google Calendars only).
• Reminders.
• Timezone Support. No more headache when traveling!
• Facebook Events and Birthdays included.
• See faces and profiles of people you are meeting with using LinkedIn.
• Weather forecast based on your location.
• Smart icons.
• Tag location to events. 
• Use Google Maps for Directions.
• Connect multiple Google Calendars.
trackCensoredName: Sunrise Calendar - for Google Calendar, Exchange and for iCloud
trackName: Sunrise Calendar - for Google Calendar, Exchange and for iCloud
releaseNotes:
Dear user,

Welcome to Sunrise 3.0 made for iOS 8! Today we're introducing our new widget, a new experience designed for iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 Plus, and two new apps: Google Tasks and Eventbrite.

We've built the best widget to show what's next in your day without opening Sunrise. You can add this new widget now from the Today View in the Notification Center. We think you are going to love the design.

Sunrise now looks great for your new iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus. We've redesigned the entire app for bigger screens.

You wanted more apps to connect to Sunrise? We've listened and this update brings you Google Tasks and Eventbrite integration. Create and edit Google tasks directly in your favorite calendar or buy a ticket on Eventbrite and it will appear in Sunrise with all the information you need to get there. Magic!

Thanks for using Sunrise everyday :)

– Life with Sunrise
